author: sproul
content:
I'd like to get <@554799849288105986>'s deposit snapshot API merged: <https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/245>

A bit of feedback from each team would be awesome. I know <@340345049063882753> was against enshrining a deposit snapshot in the checkpoint sync API, but does that extend to a standalone API (which is presumably temporary). IMO we aren't likely to change the deposit tracking mechanism particularly soon so having this API in the interim is very valuable.

author: ajsutton
content: Yeah I think having the standalone api makes sense.
